name: Operational-excellence
body: Kaizen Institute India present & welcome you to IndiZen 2016, 7th National Convention on Operational Excellence where you can find out, discuss your knowing's, experience & connect with like minded individuals. Gone to by 1000+ business leaders & specialists like you in previously from India & overseas. You have special opportunity to network, exchange ideas, & celebrate functional quality with the very best in today's marketplace. This year the theme is MAKING ABSOLUTELY NO DEFECT As Well As NO EFFECT A WAY OF LIFE. If you are using Lean/ Kaizen principles in your manufacturing or workplace or service setting or are preparing to do so, make plans to fulfill and also pick up from Lean Thinkers from top quality organizations at Kaizen Institute India's (KII's) 7th National Convention on Operational Excellence. This convention is focuseded on assisting leaders and also implementers discover straight from colleagues that have had remarkable success in the domain of Lean/ Kaizen. Convention participation will certainly be limited, so conserve the dates: February 16 - 17 at the Le Meridien, Pune, India.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
